snippet.title: Haunted Space - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the reveal trailer featuring intense space battles, massive space creatures, and more, for this upcoming sci-fi adventure game with horror elements.

In Haunted Space, take on the role of a Raider, in the service of the Human Empire, taking on quests, exploring, and scavaging resources while fighting to survive and uncovering the mystery of a galaxy haunted by an ancient civilization.

Haunted Space is headed to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, and PC.

#IGN #HauntedSpace
